byline.contributor: Scott Cacciola and Ashley Southall contributed reporting.

abstract: Indiana Pacers forward Chris Copeland is hospitalized in New York City following stabbing outside Chelsea nightclub 1 Oak; Copeland's companion, Katrine Saltara, and another woman, Catherine Somani, are also hospitalized after attack; police arrest Shevoy Bleary-Murdock and charge him with felony assault and criminal possession of a weapon.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Copeland, a former Knicks forward, was stabbed during an argument early Wednesday; a suspect was arrested, and two Atlanta Hawks players were charged with interfering in the investigation.

headline.main: Pacers’ Chris Copeland and 2 Women Are Stabbed Outside Manhattan Club
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Player and 2 Women Are Stabbed Outside a Club

snippet: Mr. Copeland, a former Knicks forward, was stabbed during an argument early Wednesday; a suspect was arrested, and two Atlanta Hawks players were charged with interfering in the investigation.
